RHighlight.p: The rice field views all the way down to the ocean, two kilometres away, are outstanding, both by night and by day. The 61-inch high definition TV in the home theatre and an exceptional library of movies also makes for a great night in, while our early morning breakfast in the gazebo overlooking the green fields was simply beautiful.

RSurroundArea.p: Munggu is quiet, green, and very traditional. There are no restaurants or shops in the area, so activities will be limited to gentle hikes through the rice fields. At Echo Beach in Canggu (9km), you will find a strip of restaurants and cafes set on a beachside bluff, including the Beach House, which offers indoor and outdoor seating, and an extensive international menu, together with a daily barbecue of fresh fish, lobster, giant prawns, clams, steaks, kebabs, etc. Live music takes place here on Sunday evenings, starting at around sunset. There is a wide choice of fine dining, mid-range, and cheap ‘n cheerful restaurants in Petitenget and Seminyak (12km). Fine dining venues include Sarong, the famous Ku Dé Ta, The Living Room, La Lucciola, Métis and Sardine. There are numerous chic boutiques in the Seminyak area, as well as furniture, antique and homeware stores located close by on the main Kerobokan road. The Nirwana Bali Golf Course (8km) is bordered by ocean and rice fields, making it one of the most visually spectacular courses in Asia. Tanah Lot sea temple is adjacent to the golf course, and is probably the most photographed temple in Bali, especially at sunset. Horse riding is available at three stables, all within 10km and all offering beach and rice field rides.

ROverallComments.p:
We’ve never seen a villa with its own pitch and putt golf range before and thought it was a tremendous addition for family fun or for allowing golfers to iron out glitches before parting with the huge green fees for the 18-hole course New Kuta Golf Club (34km).
We loved the fact that nearly all the rooms in the villa are on one level, making it very social, accessible and appropriate for all ages. And all of the bedrooms (with the exception of the lower studio room - which is slightly smaller - but very private) are very similar and won't be the cause of any group envy.
We lazed away the latter part of the day on comfy couches shaded by the funky bamboo roof of the elevated open-air living and dining deck by the pool. From here we observed the farmers ploughing and flooding the rice terraces in preparation for planting. The staff were diligently on hand with offers of snacks and drink refills to refresh us throughout these exhausting people-watching activities. At sunset we retired for a splendid Indonesian dinner in the main hall.

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: A grand villa requires a grand seating area and this is something that Villa Mandalay doesn't quite manage to deliver. Opting for symmetry rather than size, an opportunity for a major focal point has been wasted in favour of two smaller – tho’ very comfortable – sitting areas either side of the dining hall. The home theatre could do with some chairs in addition to the large mats and cushion arrangement, which might be difficult for those whose joints are a little creaky.

REVIEW.Name: Wong Carolyn
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It's the first time for me to arrange a trip with 3 families, 14 of us. Thank goodness i found Elite Havens! Prompt response, good recommendation & advise and detailed! We stayed in Mandalay for 5 nights. The attendants are so polite, attentive and made us feel so welcome! They ensured we had a comfortable stay with a clean environment! Accommodating all our requests. Mr Suka, someone that i must really compliment! He had made all our activities arrangements according to our requirements, request, and giving appropriate advises. The villa size is just right for us and the pool is huge! The 8 children had so much fun! Looking out at the padi field from the terrace every morning brighten up my days! The only negative feedback is on the 7th bedroom. It's the furthest room from the hall with too much excess of privacy. None of us stay in that room throughout.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very good week at Villa Mandalay. Good weather in Bali, excellent to stay in the swimming pool. And the bed is so comfortable. Beautiful place, nice rooms. Thanks for everything. Thanks to the staff for great service!!!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Premium
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Among all villas already experienced, Mandalay Villa remains a very good property in term of quality of services, facility and location.

REVIEW.Name: Josh Cardwell
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much Villa Mandalay. We have had an amazing time at your beautiful villa. The staff are so lovely and we had enjoyed excellent service throughout our stay. Our rooms, the pool, the beautiful common area were all excellent. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Chetna Tangnoo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great holidays at Villa Mandalay. Manager Suka was always present and he gets 10 out of 10 Heri and Chef Alit also were very good. As was driver Nyoman. Entire staff is friendly, always smiling, and our stay was superb. Excellent set-up and service staff. Thanks to all.

REVIEW.Name: Zekkei Collection
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Excellent! Good service. BBQ food was great. Chef's cooking is excellent.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for making our stay so delightful. Great staff, fantastic location and facilities. We had a great time.

REVIEW.Name: Sachin Jaiswal
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is a fantastic villa especially for large groups the staff are very helpful and prompt to deliver service

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a fantastic weekend stay at this villa, and the staffs and services have been wonderful. We would love to come back here again for family vacation in future.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Villa Mandalay for a magnificent stay! You went beyond expectations to ensure that our stay was relaxing and unforgettable. We will definitely be back again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for the great service! We had a lovely stay at Mandalay. The food was very good and your property is beautiful. I hope to return again another day. The view is amazing and we enjoyed the pool as well.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for taking such very good care of all of us, you spoiled us all!! :) We had wonderful time here in Villa Mandalay. Thanks to the helpful staff... Pak Gede, Edy, Heri, Dewi and also Pak Alit for delicious food/BBQ. Excellent service!!! This was one of our best holidays, we love the pool. So sad to leave, we highly recommend your villa and hope to be back one day. Thanks you for an unforgettable experience.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Many thanks for this unforgettable journey in Villa Mandalay for the 40th anniversary of a small French team! A great staff, a great place, a great island. The best birthday. I wish, we will back soon. We have had such a wonderful time in Villa Mandalay. Thank you for your hospitality, the delicious food and for your friendliness.

REVIEW.Name: Travel Serv Co. Ltd.-Shanghai Beijing Zanadu International
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Such a lovely place! We loved it here.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Had a lovely lovely time here in Villa Mandalay. The villa is simply lovely. Friendly Staff. Keep it up people!!!

REVIEW.Name: Rene Stammbach
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for the good time we had in the villa. Excellent service and very friendly and nice staff!! Will come again.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Prettiest villa in Bali! Spacious, luxurious and clean. Extremely warm hospitality. Total a home away from home. Thank you so very much for our wonderful and unforgettable stay at Villa Mandalay. Your service was out of this world.

REVIEW.Name: Davy Sanh
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for your kind hospitality. This was the perfect place to celebrate my 30th with my closest friends from around the world. We had wonderful time - food was excellent, service was exceptional, and the view is ecstatic! We will return another day....

REVIEW.Name: Villa Novo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for the most amazing holiday! This is the best place we have ever stayed and thank you for making the wedding so unforgettable! A big shout out to all the AMAZING staff who made our stay unforgettable. What an incredible experience for us, and our families. We have never had such amazing service from wonderful staff. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Joe Lei Tee
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you. We had a wonderful holiday. We hope to come back soon. The staff were very friendly :)

REVIEW.Name: Boris Minnen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the lovely time at the amazing villa. Magnificent people, perfect service and a lot of Bintang!! Enjoyed the weekend.

REVIEW.Name: Jacy Logue
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing Villa. We are moving in. Watch out!! Love Mandalay and love the staff - also great food! Thank you. We will be back!!

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Good times, Good people!. Great times in Bali @ Villa Mandalay. Definitely come back .

REVIEW.Name: Nilumi Ziffer
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stay at villa Mandalay for 10 days in September. We had 6 adults and 6 children age 1-6 years. The villa was beautiful as expected. The staff were very helpful, specially how tolerant they were of the children and the mess. the food was outstanding thanks to the skilled chef. We highly recommend anyone stay here.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks a lot for your help and kindness!!! We had the best time and the best birthday celebration!!

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all for everything, we had a blast!!!! Thank you to the amazing staff.

REVIEW.Name: Escape Travel Norwood
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for a great stay. Six adults and five children all have superb time. Many Thanks.

REVIEW.Name: Villa Novo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Many many thanks for this wonderful time that we spend with you for the last 10 days. You were really amazing and made us feel like home!!! We hope to come back very soon and meet you all again.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Villas Cantik
REVIEW.ROverallComments: My family and I came to Villa Mandalay to celebrate my 40th Birthday. We are group of 10 adults and 6 young children. We had the most wonderful time. The villa was stunning, we love the vista overlooking the rice paddies and the beautiful pool. The staff were super friendly and helped us with anything we need, even a six year old's pink birthday cake. The food was delicious, both for kids and adults. We will definitely be back!

REVIEW.Name: Mandy Neo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The food was nice and suit our liking. Friendly, efficient staff. The villa is well maintained, the swimming pool was definitely the central attraction, the view is simply breathtaking, like paradise on earth, especially for urban people like us. We enjoyed our stay very much, wish we can spend more time, and we will definitely back.

REVIEW.Name: CASLIN LUO KAIXIN
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Gorgeous villa, beautiful pool, attentive and sincere staff. Great Service! Will definitely recommend to friends. Food is great!

REVIEW.Name: Eve Chua
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We are a family of 18, ranging from 1,5 years old to 70 years old. All of us love the stay at Villa Mandalay. Everyone from Suka, Heri, Chef and the gang took very good care of us. Overall the villa is comfortable, spacious, tranquil and the highlight is actually the 25m pool. We will definitely come back again.

REVIEW.Name: Villalet Pty Ltd Villalet Pty Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a fabulous place! Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Excellent venue, we had a wonderful time. Great venue for business retreat.

REVIEW.Name: (Australia) Pty. Ltd Abercrombie & Kent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We never felt uncomfortable. Service was great, staff were very attentive, the sound system was incredible! The overall experience was everything we hoped it would be and more. We thank you for making our weekend one that we will never forget.

REVIEW.Name: Urmi Travels
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Marvelous. Great. Enjoyed a lot. Good service. Good staff. Excellent hospitality. Exclusive property. It's worth to stay at Bali in Villa Mandalay. No way to describe in words. Everything is excellent.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fifteen family members descended on this villa to celebrate a significant birthday in the family. We have all relaxed immensley, and most importantly been well taken care by all of the staff here at Villa Mandalay. Nothing was too much trouble, they were always available to give advice as we needed it. The food was delicious and tasty, especially the local Indonesian dishes. We hope to be back at some stage to repeat the experience. Thank you all of the lovely staff!!

REVIEW.Name: Sunita Kaur Sandhu
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We would like to express our appreciation for the excellent service and warm hospitality. We had everything served to us with such warm smiles and friendly words. The portions of food were generous and very tasty. Compliments to the Chef and all your staff. It was perfect holiday. Your villa is the best villa I've ever seen. The facilities are great. We hope to be back. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa staff headed by Heri and Chef Alit were very efficient and very professional!. Edy the driver was awesome! We will be back here for sure. Your staff was very accommodating and wonderful.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our stay was so enjoyable - staff, food, everything just amazing. Loved the villa and the staff. Thank you very much.

REVIEW.Name: Pui Nam Annis Law
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all the staffs here at Villa Mandalay for helping us. You guys are all very helpful and friendly. The villa environment is very comfortable and tidy. We all had a great time staying here, and will definetely recommend this villa to our friends and family. Special thanks to Suka, Heri, Gede, The Chef and Edy. Thanks again :)

REVIEW.Name: Ciliandry Fangiono
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great villa, great service by the staffs. Feel welcomed, and staff was very helpful since we checked in! Really enjoyed it!

REVIEW.Name: Irene Ho Kim Kee Agace
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our stay at Villa Mandalay has been 5 star on all accounts. The staff were very friendly and relaxed providing a great service, making this holiday even more enjoyable. Our compliments to the Chef, as the food was fantastic. The facilities such as the chipping green and the sauna were second to none. Having spent many years in Bali, Villa Mandalay is unique and we all felt very at home. Simon, Lyn, Family and friends.

REVIEW.Name: Jane Alwyn Ward
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had an amazing time here. Staff, food + location all top match.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Bli Suka & Bli Heri.....Thank you soo much for all the help!!! Very friendly & helpful. The villa is really beautiful & perfect for family. Thank you all the staffs for more nice food and great assistance for Nana & Grand dad...Hope see you all again.

REVIEW.Name: Zeng Yi Chen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Excellent service.

REVIEW.Name: Jane Guang Wei Wang
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful stay. Staffs are super friendly and professional. Totally recommend anyone who wants to have good villa experience.

REVIEW.Name: Young-Ri Choi
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was wonderful time in Villa Mandalay. Thank you for giving us great service and welcome. You guys are the best. I wish I could come with all my family members. Maybe next time in the near future.

REVIEW.Name: Jacinthe Latour
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for this weekend, it was fantastic. The staff were great and helpful. The Chef provided excellent meals. Everything was clean and the villa is simply beautiful, see you soon.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all of the staff at this beautiful villa. Everyone was amazing, as was the food. Thank you so much for helping make our wedding here one of our most precious memories.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for everything you have done during our stay. The staff and the facilities have been outstanding. We have enjoyed our stay and hopefully be back soon. So nice to come to such a beautiful place. The staff have been awesome.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding Helper Bali Wedding Helper
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Lovely stay in Villa Mandalay. Food, view, service, pool and atmosphere - everything around here was perfect. All the guests include myself enjoyed every aspect of Villa Mandalay. It was great choice to do a wedding in Bali, especially here in Villa Mandalay. The memory of Bali will be always wonderful because of this place. We thank all the staff for their extraordinary service, warming smile and smooth support.

REVIEW.Name: Chris Canale
REVIEW.ROverallComments: From the moment we arrived, this has been the most wonderful vacation my family has been on. The drivers at the airport were very helpful and kind. When we arrived at villa, the greeting and drinks were both amazing, the villa is gorgeous! Amazingly clean, the ground are amazing, the ponds, the pool, the room, the bar and the golf! The very best part was the staff, everyone was kind, helpful and great to be around. The meals we had were better than fine dinning restaurants. Watching our children enjoy the villa and the memories we made with friends will be cherished forever. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Lovely staff, will definitely come back again. Flawless service, nicely located with great views. Great rooms and comfy beds. Very happy with service, facilities and pool. Accommodation overall is amazing and we will recommend and come back again. Thanks so much for delicious meals too.

REVIEW.Name: Thomas Phil
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful villa, great location, well maintained. Heri, Alit, Edy and Suka were fantastic, friendly and readily available. Traditional cooking available at the villa was great. Suka was very attentive and accommodating.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful location, fantastic villa, welcoming and friendly staff. Love, love loved our experience here. Amazing experience here at Mandalay. Best Sangria EVER! Great location, very relaxing, amazing staff. Great facilities and service and amazing food! We feel so spoilt. It's been a beautiful place to stay with amazing food, kind and helpful staff and many awesome experiences.

REVIEW.Name: YANG HONG LING
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great hospitality. Well recommended and great English speaking staff.
